name: full-stack-portfolio-be
description: <!-- Messaging Server --> * Allows Users to: ** Log in ** post direct messages to contacts ** Post public messages ** View message history:  *** Users can view all messages sent and received in chrono order *** Users can reply to a message and view threads in chrono order *** Message threads can be seen by anyone who replied * Contains databases for: ** Users ** Message history *
author: Kenti Johnson
